theorem.name: rev_inductive_clause

text.english: Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{rev}\): \[ \forall l \in L_A . \forall a \in A . \; \texttt{rev}(a :: l) = \texttt{app}(\texttt{rev}(l), [a]) \]
text.italiano: Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{rev}\): \[ \forall l \in L_A . \; \forall a \in A . \; \texttt{rev}(a :: l) = \texttt{app}(\texttt{rev}(l), [a]) \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem rev_inductive_clause: forall l : list , forall a : A , rev (a :: l) = app (rev l) [a].
Proof.
Admitted.
